title: Introduction to Proof and Problem Solving
description: Students learn the basic concepts and ideas necessary for upper-division mathematics and techniques of mathematical proof. Introduction to sets, relations, elementary mathematical logic, proof by contradiction, mathematical induction, and counting arguments.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements; MATH 11A or MATH 19A or MATH 20A; and MATH 21 or AM 10 or AMS 10A.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section. Sections begin Wed., Oct 4th for Fall 2023.
